website_summaries.verdict: Appropriate for some tasks, but lacks the superior craftsmanship of some other models.
pros: Easy-to-use screw adjusts pressure precisely for sturdy and delicate tasks
Rubber stops, 8-inch design, and streamlined handles are ideal for crafts and glass work
cons: Consumers comment that they arrive covered in grease
They also tend to rust over time

customer_reviews.title: Buy these, and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best running pliers that I have ever purchased. I always get a nice clean break in the glass, and do not need much pressure at all. These are comfortable in my hand, not too heavy. The rubber tips are thick and have not slipped off like other sets I have used. Very pleased with this purchase, and if I ever need them again (which I doubt because they are great quality) I will come back to these again.
customer_reviews.author: R Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great for craft projects and breaking short pieces of glass!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I wanted to cut glass for craft projects and I was a little skeptical of the legitimacy of a running pliers, but when I received them I cut a piece right away and it worked amazingly! I was very impressed. Breaks glass clean and smooth. All you have to do is line it up and apply just a teeny amount of pressure. The pliers seems sturdy and heavy. I bought these instead of plastic ones because it was just a couple dollars more for the metal ones. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Dorcas Swartzentruber

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Manufactured
customer_reviews.text: Now, I'm not one to be really picky about a tool and the condition that it is in, but this is a bit ridiculous. With the price of the tool being on the cheaper side, I was expecting it to not be perfect. I however, did not expect for the entire tool to be poorly machined, have the appearance it was used, and come with the package already opened. I am willing to bet I had received​ a returned item. TAKE YOUR MONEY ELSEWHERE AND GET SOMETHING BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce. B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of running pliers - good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These running pliers are great! They are not too heavy to use and are very sturdy. They are adjustable so you can use them on different thicknesses of glass. I do find that they don't like to snap anything less than about 3/8" though, so I use my plastic pair of running pliers for those jobs. Oh, and the price was very reasonable I thought for the quality of the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Mark J. Carnie

customer_reviews.title: You have been warned
customer_reviews.text: These running pliers are misleading. Picture shows rounded cutting edges and thick rubber. I received pliers with squared edges and cheap rubber coating on the cutting end. I’ve used these for 4 small projects and the rubber at the working edge is broken down and tearing apart. These are a definite DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT WHAT IS PICTURED!!!
customer_reviews.text: These running pliers are misleading. Picture shows rounded cutting edges and thick rubber. I received pliers with squared edges and cheap, thin rubber coating on the cutting end. These are a definite DO NOT PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.author: H G.

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Pliers for Stain Glass Cutting
customer_reviews.text: I bought these running pliers to go in a stain glass kit I was making up for my son for Christmas. They are well made and work great. They have a set screw so the amount of pressure can be controlled that is applied to the glass. I am told that this is very important. They also come with a set a rubber stops.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Adams

customer_reviews.title: The metal part of these are fine, however I purchased two pairs of these and ...
customer_reviews.text: The metal part of these are fine, however I purchased two pairs of these and both pair the rubber tips are so soft the fell apart halfway through the mosaic I was working on. Like another customer had to wrap the ends in tape.
customer_reviews.author: Benz

customer_reviews.title: Great low budged running pliers
customer_reviews.text: For the price, these are very good. There are some minor imperfections, scuff marks, etc. If they really bother you, it's nothing a little time and sandpaper won't fix. The jaws and tips, which are the most important feature, are very well machined. The rubber stops are lubricated inside, so they won't dry out. Set screw is easy to adjust, and properly tapped.
customer_reviews.author: FriagramTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Rubber wears through very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pliers to "snap" pre-scored glass for projects. Initially I was very happy with them- they are sturdy and worked well. However after using them only a few times, the rubber coating over the tips is already in pieces and falling off, making them no good to use for what I initially bought them for. This is a big disappointment for me and not something I have had issues with with other pliers like this in the past.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: VERY VERY HELPFUL
customer_reviews.text: This is a product I have wanted for a while! I love to make keychains, and this product helps me close the ends without bending the ends. I am very happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these for some mosaic projects and they have worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Running Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Oh my, so wish I would of bought this a year ago. I make glass wind chimes and this tool makes it so much easier to break the glass instead of hitting the back side of the score line. If ever lost or broken, I will purchase again. The line in the middle diffidently helps with the alignment.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lovitt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Rugged construction, nice grips, jaws mate in the requred curve and have thick plastic pads, adjustment works easily. Unlike some other reviews, my pair arrived clean in the blister-pack store packaging. The outer faces are polished to a brushed finish. A nice tool that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, and not using that word lightly
customer_reviews.text: After watching many videos on cutting thin glass and still having a 50% success rate, I purchased a set of these. Amazing, and not using that word lightly. If you have any trouble cutting glass, especially newcomers. these are an essential tool. Arrived quickly and worked better than I could have anticipated.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W. Carter

customer_reviews.title: They do the job!
customer_reviews.text: The center mark on mine is about 1/8" off and angled. They do the job, though, once you get used to it. Wish I could find some replacement rubber tips for it because I've torn them up pretty quickly. Other than that, they seem like they will last for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GraphicsSnob

customer_reviews.title: I would buy this product again
customer_reviews.text: The description was exactly what it says. Makes crimping so much easier and does not leave a mark on the metal
customer_reviews.author: Becky Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Useless tool
customer_reviews.text: The plastic these are dipped in is so flimsy its difficult to tell if it is only packaging. Without it, these damage the surface of glass tile badly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael White

customer_reviews.title: Protective ends are useless
customer_reviews.text: These work fine but the plastic protectors on the tips only worked for three uses. You need to wrap them in fabric or something to protect the surface you are squeezing together.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Good running pliers
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. I'm just not finding a lot of need for straight cuts, which is what these runningpliers facilitate. Handles a little sticky, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mielmonster

customer_reviews.title: Needs replaceable plastic pieces
customer_reviews.text: Make making key chains and lanyards much easier... Wish it can with replaceable plastic pieces...
customer_reviews.author: Ma Dukes

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality tool. The metal was peeling between the pinchers, causing a sharp edge. The handles wobbled significantly. I had to return it. Not functional. Mine might have just been a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: RED

customer_reviews.title: works well for cutting class. I bought this along ...
customer_reviews.text: works well for cutting class. I bought this along with the circle glass cutter to make round glass circles and it worked well. It took a little practice but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Ted E.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: If your are cutting sheet glass these are pretty much a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Used??
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in a new package but the tool itself looks used. Disappointed but needed to use it right away so I won’t be returning it. I’ll be replacing it with something better soon.
customer_reviews.author: MeGo

customer_reviews.title: Not great, better than nothing...almost
customer_reviews.text: These are not very well machined, as was mentioned in another review. They are not good for long cuts (anything over about 5") They're not worth the $15, buy a set of cheap ones, they may be better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: I totally Regret this purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purposely bought these for the fact they are rubber coated and I didn't even squeeze them fully and the rubber tore! So disappointing!! Had I known this I would have used my old ones and saved my money! I didn't even want to give one star! ☹️😤
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great value and very sturdy. must have
customer_reviews.text: came sealed in a box. great item. easy to use, very sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Items

customer_reviews.title: However it came with rubber tips that were ripped and useless. I ended up wrapping the ends with duck ...
customer_reviews.text: Tool works as it should. However it came with rubber tips that were ripped and useless. I ended up wrapping the ends with duck tape so it won't scratch my projects.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Cut a large mirror just fine first try
customer_reviews.text: This worked great! I never have cut glass before, but I made two cuts on a 31''x45'' mirror, and the running pliers cut the mirror perfectly. Recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, I just wish it came with replacement rubber shrouds for the tips
customer_reviews.author: Lynn E. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Work just fine. Now if I could get a cutter that was this quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great for stained glass, just learning the ends & outs of it
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap. The handle broke off the pliers the third time i used them.
customer_reviews.author: The tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The pliers were not ground down evenly so that there is uneven force on the glass.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product, Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, quality product. I have used these to make stained glass art and couldn't be happier. The adjustment screw is a wonderful added feature. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lithawitch

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The rubber cracked after just a few uses and often chips my glass.
customer_reviews.author: julia arkles

customer_reviews.title: Looks secondhand. Arrived dirty and rusty
customer_reviews.text: Dirty rusty metal parts. "Clear " plastic edges yellowing and scruffy looking. Look 10 years old
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Used one at my local glass shop ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Used one at my local glass shop ans had to have one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a very old pair of running pliers that I've using for over 25 years. They still work, but I wanted new ones. These were shipped promptly and work great. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Bellis

customer_reviews.title: Good love them I will be back
customer_reviews.text: Love these works good. Price is right and I like the rubber on the ends. love love Good love them I will be back
customer_reviews.author: christa hartman

customer_reviews.title: Solid product but it looks used
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself seems of high-quality but the rubber protectors at the tips were shipped torn at the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy2017

customer_reviews.title: Filthy going in the trash
customer_reviews.text: These arrived in a factory package and GREASY! Looked like a mechanic had used it. Gross.
customer_reviews.author: Kili Fujiwara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: pliers worked very well, and will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Duran

customer_reviews.title: Terrible shape for being new
customer_reviews.text: Terrible shape for being new.. I have a feeling I received used instead of new. First, I noticed the package was already opened. The handle grips are scratched, rubber covers are split and metal working parts are not deburred, making the edges sharp. Total crap!!
customer_reviews.author: Devon Zeringue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These pliers are exactly what I needed to add to my stain glass tool box. Thanks for recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: they don't make life easier which is the point of a good tool
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this one First off if you are a woman or have small hands these are to big and to heavy ... they as other's have said are dirty they smell like oil ... that's not what i don't like about them.. i prefer spring loaded pliers they are easier on the hands and wrists and much more effective spend a couple more dollars and get spring loaded running pliers... with these you have to open them back up every cut...why work with that and again not for small hands
customer_reviews.author: Kareese

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Needed one fast. Works okay. More like a tool for beginner quality.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Muskie

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for my stained glass projects! Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this! It works great with out bending the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! It works great with out bending the plate and puts them on even.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: tips slide off with some ease but what the heh.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for my wonderful wife she said that they were GREAT
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running Pliers
customer_reviews.text: I needed these right away and I got them right away. Pliers were excellent and they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Allan Cambell

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly safe for fabric key fobs, no scratching!
customer_reviews.text: Very practical and glad to have them so I don't scratch the metals of my fabric key fobs!

customer_reviews.title: Good tool.
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to working with glass, but these work well.
customer_reviews.author: Pitt Fan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tool!  It makes cutting glass SOOOOO much easier and safer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never knew how easy glass-cutting could be! These Running Pliars are AWESOME!!!

customer_reviews.title: grip felt good and not cheap
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to. grip felt good and not cheap. Good sturdy tips.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They do what they are supposed to do. Work as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: i do like using this to help me brake my glass good grip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No complaints!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Good buy, well made, and working as they should.
customer_reviews.author: TheScienceType

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just need to learn to use, never cut glass before
customer_reviews.author: Jim Goshorn

customer_reviews.title: This tool literally looks like it's been used for years
customer_reviews.text: This tool literally looks like it's been used for years. I was disappointed when I took it out of its package and saw how dirty it was.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Super fast delivery time -- I had the pliers less ...
customer_reviews.text: Super fast delivery time -- I had the pliers less than 24 hours later even though I didn't order overnight. Great purchase. They crimp without leaving marks! YES!
customer_reviews.author: Breezy

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! I use it for so many different projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Rose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This tool is amazing. if you work with glass this is a must have
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: Best Running Pliers
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Running Pliers, even work better than expected on narrow, curvy cuts
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Well formed with good parallel, even jaw lines.
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, feel, sturdy set. Raw steel, heavy duty. Might need to was a bit to avoid rust. Well formed with good parallel, even jaw lines. Does not look used. blackened surface material can scratch off easily so in transit that may cause the effect we are hearing about from some reviewers but don't know for sure.
customer_reviews.author: overthetopboys

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived looking "used"
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't too impressed for these to arrive full of grease on the rubber handles and the tipped pads are yellowed & dirty. Going to try and clean these up before first use. Hope they come clean. Would not recommend these to purchase if these are for crafting purposes. Would hate for projects to get ruined from the grease.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: dirty, and in an open package
customer_reviews.text: As a few other reviewers have said, these pliers came very scuffed up, dirty, and in an open package. Some metal parts are even rusty, the pliers look like they've been sitting on someones tool bench for years. I was really shocked because I don't remember ordering used pliers. Will be returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: TOP TOOLS TOP-RP Running Pliers
product_meta.description: Use running pliers to "run" a score along glass and break glass pieces with ease. Simply position the jaws of these durable metal pliers at the end of your score on the edge of the glass, and gently squeeze for a clean break. Convenient centering mark helps the curved jaw to exert equal pressure on each side of the score. Measures 8" long.
feature_bullets: Curved jaws apply leverage to run the score reducing hand fatigue
Center mark makes it easy to align the center of the jaws with your score
Adjustable set screw allows you to control the amount of pressure applied

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars163 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
